events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because the size doesn't fit me at all.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for returning the item and getting money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request regarding the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in the original packaging for the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 4587321. I have not worn the jacket yet and it is still in the box with all original tags.
Thanks for the details! We will initiate your refund once you send the jacket back. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and the clear instructions. I appreciate the help with the return process.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and to see if you need any further assistance.
Since your refund was successfully processed and confirmed, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
